name: Clarm
long_description:
Clarm is your AI deep research agent builder for internal knowledge, particularly for high-trust environments. Our platform connects across 40+ enterprise integrations - CRMs, email, knowledge bases - and lets you build precise, repeatable workflows that transform how teams work without Compliance and Legal headaches.

Here's what Clarm's customers and prospects are excited about:

- a law firm to find relevant information within the thousands of emails and documents
- a bank to personalize communication and understand investment preferences on the level of each human
- an asset manager to evaluate proxy voting preferences across 90,000 shareholder meetings
- a top open source startup to increase engagement with their Github repo and knowledge base
- a services firm to instantly answer '000s of client support questions, driving up engagement and turning curious prospects into committed customers
